results.title: The Association Between Second-Line Oral Antihyperglycemic Medication on Types of Dementia in Type 2 Diabetes: A Nationwide Real-World Longitudinal Study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ + DPP-4i and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ + @CHEMICAL_2_4_thiazolidinedione @CHEMICAL_MESH:C089946 @@@TZD@@@ were associated with significantly lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Glycogen_Storage_Disease_0_Muscle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566917 @@@AD@@@ (HR = 0.922 and 0.812), compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@SU@@@.

citations.NLM: Kim WJ, Noh JH, Han K, Park CY. The Association Between Second-Line Oral Antihyperglycemic Medication on Types of Dementia in Type 2 Diabetes: A Nationwide Real-World Longitudinal Study. J Alzheimers Dis. 2021;81(3):1263-1272. PMID: 33935082
